#summary Use Case: PostAssignment
#labels UseCase,Teacher

==UseCases==


= PostAssignment =


|| Use Case || PostAssignment ||
||Identified || T2 ||
|| Description: || The PostAssignment use case models a Teacher posting an assignment on VINYL for students to see. ||
||Actors|| Teacher||
|| Preconditions: || 1. Teacher must be successfully logged in with Teacher privileges via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when a Teacher selects Post Assignment.||
||                ||2. The Teacher will be asked to select a class from list of options. ||
||                ||2.1 If the Teacher selects a class, move on to step 3. ||
||                ||2.2        If the Teacher fails to select class, error message will occur reflecting that a class has not been chosen.||
||                ||3. The Teacher will be prompted to enter text.||
||                ||3.1 The Teacher will enter desired message. ||
||                ||3.2 Optionally, the Teacher may indicate that one or more files are to be submitted for the assignment.||
||                ||3.3 Optionally, the Teacher may enter a due date for the assignment.||
||                ||3.4 The Teacher will hit Post button. ||
||                ||4. If the Teacher failed to enter text, an error message will occur reflecting that notion. ||
||                ||5. Else  the Teacher will receive a message, “Assignment Successfully Posted” ||
||Post Condition:|| 1. The assignment will be available for viewing by the appropriate parties through the ReadAssignment use case.||
